50749.<%sM_job>の <%sM_skill1><%sM_01>を振り直すと\n<:
If you reset <%sM_job>'s <%sM_skill1>, <%dL_Spoint> skill points will be refunded.
However, Master Skill Points and skill points from vocation quests will not be refunded. Do you wish to reset your skill points?

86513.全やりなおしの宝珠を捧げると\n全てのスキルが 振り直されます。\n<br>\n:
If you use a Resettall Stone, all skill points of all vocations will be refunded.
Your current skill and spell positions will stay as they after using this item. Reset skill points of all vocations?

86514.「<%sC_ITEM>は ひとつ\n <%nC_gold>ゴールドになるが\n:
One <%sC_ITEM> costs <%dC_gold> Gold.
This is the one you'd like?
<yesno><close>

86515.捧げる宝珠を 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please choose a jewel to offer.
<break>

86516.「では 確かに <%nC_gold>ゴールド受け取った。\n やりなおしの宝珠を: Thank you. Please take this stone.

86518.「そうか……。\n では 必要になったら また来るがいい。: I see... Please come back when you need to.

86519.「……ふむ。\n しかし 所持金が 足りないようだな。\n 出直してくるがよい。:
Hmm... it seems you're short on money. Come
back when you have enough.

86520.「宝珠を 青い炎に捧げた後も\n 呪文や特技の表示内容は 一度変更するまで\n:
Even after offering the jewel to the blue flame, your current skill and spell positions will stay as they are.
I've placed the <%sC_ITEM> into your bag. Please return here if you need my services again.

86521.全やりなおしの宝珠は 青い炎に\n吸いこまれていった……。\n<end>:
The Resettall Stone was engulfed by the
blue flame...
<end>

86522.「……ふむ。\n しかし そなたの持ち物が いっぱいのようだ。\n かばんを空け:
Hmm... It seems you're carrying too much.
Please make some room and come back.

86524.<select_se_off>\nやりなおしの宝珠(3000Ｇ)\n職やりなおし:
<select_se_off>
Regretta Stone (3000 G)
Resetta Stone (10000 G)
Resettall Stone (30000 G)
<select_end><break>

86525.青い炎が 神々しく燃えさかっている。:
It's a blue flame, burning with a divine
power.

86526.「バグレア教会跡地に\n ガミルゴの護符を納めた そなたには\n 闘神ラダ・ガー:
You have placed Gamilgo's Amulet in the Bagulea Church Vestige, and have been blessed by Lada Gart, the god of war.
By offering a stone to that blue flame, Lada Gart shall answer you and help you to reset your skill points.
The stones you can offer are sold here for a nominal fee. Would you like to buy any?

86527.「私は オーグリード大陸 ガートラント王国が\n 建国王 闘神ラダ・ガートの遺志:
I am the founder of the Kingdom of Gartlant, and the legacy of Lada Gart, the god of war. I came to this land to help more travelers.
You have been blessed by Lada Gart himself, so do not worry. You may reset your skill points here as well.
If you offer a stone to the blue flame in Gartlant, you may reset your skill points.
You can buy the stones here for a nominal fee. Would you like to buy one?

86528.「ガートラント王国から持ってきた あの青い炎の\n 種火に やりなおしの宝珠を捧:
If you offer a stone to the blue flame in Gartlant, you can reset your skill points.
You can buy the stones here for a nominal fee. Would you like to buy one?

86529.<select_se_off>\nやりなおしの宝珠を捧げる\n職やりなおしの宝珠:
<select_se_off>
Offer Regretta Stone
Offer Resetta Stone
Offer Resettall Stone
Cancel
<select_end><break>

87420.スキルポイントを 振りわけていないため\nスキルの振り直しが できません。:
You can't reset that skill line because you
haven't assigned any skill points.

88320.捧げる宝珠を 選んでください。\nマスタースキルポイントは ここでは\n振り直す:

Master Skill Points will not be reset.
<break>

122383.ここで スキルの振り直しが できるようだ。\n<color_yellow>※つか:
You can reset skill points here. You may also use the Infinite Repeatstone to reset your skill points.
Reset your currently allocated skill points? points?

165547.「バグレア教会跡地の 迷える魂を\n 救った そなたには\n 闘神ラダ・ガートの:
You have rescued the lost souls of the Bagulea Church Vestige, and have been blessed by Lada Gart, the god of war.
By offering a stone to that blue flame in your Key Items, Lada Gart shall answer you and help you to reset your skill points anywhere.
The stones you can offer are sold here or in Item Shops for a nominal fee. Would you like to buy any?

249218.職やりなおしの宝珠を捧げると\n選択した職業で 覚えているスキルが\n振り直され:

Your current skill and spell positions will stay as they after using this item. Reset one vocation's skill points?

259246.<%sM_job>の <%sM_skill1><%sM_01>を振り直すと\n<:
If you reset <%sM_job>'s <%sM_skill1> skill, <%dL_Spoint> skill points will be refunded.
However, Master Skill Points and skill points from vocation quests will not be refunded.
Any points allocated into other skill lines will be reset as well.
Do you wish to reset your skill points?

259247.<%sM_job>の <%sM_skill1><%sM_01>を振り直すと\n<:
If you reset <%sM_job>'s <%sM_skill1>, <%dL_Spoint> skill points will be refunded.
However, Master Skill Points, skill points from vocation quests, and skill points added from other skill lines will not be refunded.
